triples.name: Consensus Dynamics
triples.relevance: Fundamental concept underlying consensus control methods for achieving agreement among multiagent systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent System
triples.relevance: Core application domain for fixed-time and prescribed-time consensus control strategies.

triples.name: Mobile Robot
triples.relevance: Key application platform for implementing and testing consensus control algorithms in practical scenarios.

triples.name: Smart Grid
triples.relevance: Critical application domain where consensus control enables coordination and optimization of distributed energy systems.

triples.name: Settling Time
triples.relevance: Key performance metric that fixed-time and prescribed-time consensus controllers aim to bound explicitly.
